generic_program.body: Press and hold the ON-OFF button for 5 seconds. The status light should now be blinking. Then press next.

generic_imitate.title: Copy your remote signal
generic_imitate.body: Click the button on your remote that is paired to your device.

generic_test_remote.title: Test your remote
generic_test_remote.body: Press a random button on your remote or click the button in the image above to test the signal. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch.title: Test your device
generic_test_switch.body: Use the switch above to test your device. Press next to continue.

generic_program.title: Pair your device with homey
generic_program.body: Put your device in pairing mode and click next to pair homey to your device.

generic_dipswitch.title: Set dipswitches of device
generic_dipswitch.body: Click on the dipswitches above to put them in the same arrangement as those of your device, then click next.

generic_test_button.title: Test your device
generic_test_button.body: Use the button above to test your device. Press next to continue.

generic_test_switch_2.body: Use your remote or the switch above to test your device. Press next to continue.

generic_imitate.body: Click a button on your remote to pair it.
generic_imitate.title: Pair your remote

generic_choice.title: Pair device with homey or copy signal from remote
generic_choice.body: Choose if you want to copy an existing signal from a paired remote or if you want to generate a new signal to pair this device.

generic_info.title: Locate the dipswitches on your socket
generic_info.body: Locate the dipswitches on your socket as displayed above, then click next.
